name: VWapi
description: Visual Weather api. Returns beautiful pictures with the current weather.

LRU_SIZE.description: Size on an LRU cache, by default takes around 51 MB of RAM when full

LRU_EXPIRE.description: Time in seconds after which LRU cache entry expires (default: 30 min)

MONGO_DB.description: Telegram bot MongoDB database for analytics (disabled if not set)

API_BASE.description: Change it to your local instance for better telegram bot performance.
